full_description:
Value-Top CL1012 12CM ARGB CPU Cooler

The Value Top CL1012 is an air-cooled CPU cooler made to maintain the temperature of your processor even under high use. It has a 120mm fan with a maximum speed of 800-1900 RPM, which produces ample airflow to cool the CPU. A 4 Pin PWM connector powers the fan, enabling the motherboard to control the fan speed in response to CPU temperature. Additionally, this cooler has ARGB lighting, giving your PC setup a more fashionable appearance. You can alter the LED color to make it match your PC's color scheme. Numerous CPU sockets, such as AMD FM2, FM1, AM3+, AM3, AM2+, AM2, AM4, 940, 939, and 754, and Intel LGA115X, LGA775, and LGA 1700, are compatible with the Value Top CL1012. With a maximum TDP of 75W, this cooler is appropriate for mid-range processors. The cooler has great design which goes well with the majority of PC setups. Additionally, it comes with an easy-to-install Universal Multi-socket Color Box Packing that fits a variety of CPU sockets. Value Top CL1012 is a wonderful option if you're looking for a reasonably priced air cooler with beautiful lighting and dependable cooling.

full_description:
Value-Top CL2903A 11CM RGB CPU Cooler

The Value-Top CL2903A Air RGB CPU cooler has designed to keep your processor cool during intense use. The heat is effectively dispersed from the CPU to the heatsink for its dual tower design and six heat pipes. With a TDP of up to 140W, the cooler can handle high-end CPUs. RGB lighting is another feature of this cooler that gives your PC setup a fashionable appearance. It is possible to adjust the LED color to blend in with your PC color scheme. The motherboard can control the fan speed in response to the CPU temperature since the lighting is driven by a 4 Pin PWM connector. Many different CPU sockets can be used with the Value Top CL2903A, such as AMD FM2, FM1, AM3+, AM3, AM2+, AM2, AM4, 940, 939, and 754. Intel LGA775, LGA115X, and LGA1700 are also compatible. The fan is appropriate for the majority of PC configurations because of its maximum height of 110mm. The cooler has a 120mm fan that can rotate up to 1600 RPM, which is a high enough speed to create enough airflow to cool the CPU. The fan is appropriate for settings where noise levels are a concern because of its quiet operation design. The Value Top CL2903A cpu cooler is a wonderful option if you're searching for a reasonably priced air cooler with beautiful lighting and effective cooling. It provides excellent performance at a reasonable cost for its dual tower design, six heat pipes, and RGB lights.

It has a single 80mm fan that rotates at 2000 RPM to give your system the best possible cooling. Since this cooler lacks LED lights, it's a wonderful choice for people who like a more subdued look. Value Top CL100 may fit a wide range of processor architectures since it can work with several CPU sockets, such as INTEL LGA115X/ LGA775/ LGA 1700 and AMD AM3+/ AM3/ AM2+/ AM2/ AM4/ 940/ 939/ 754. For simple installation, a 3-pin fan power connector is included. The Value Top CL100 cpu cooler  has a heat sink composed of aluminum, which provides excellent heat dissipation for maximum cooling efficiency. The cooler is packaged in a universal multi socket color box that makes it easy to use with a variety of CPU socket types. In general, people who value effective cooling and compatibility with a range of CPU sockets will find the Value Top CL100 to be a dependable option.
